meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gray.
meanings.sent1: The grayness of the sky made it look gloomy.
meanings.sent2: I painted my room in a beautiful shade of grayness.
meanings.sent3: The grayness of the cat's fur matched the color of the clouds.
meanings.sent4: The grayness of the old building gave it a sense of history.
meanings.sent5: The grayness of the stone walls added a touch of elegance to the castle.

meanings.definition: Dullness or lack of interest or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Her face showed a hint of grayness as she listened to the boring lecture.
meanings.sent2: The grayness of the movie made it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent3: The grayness of the party made everyone yawn.
meanings.sent4: The grayness of the book made it difficult to finish.
meanings.sent5: The grayness of the conversation drained all energy from the room.
